name: eth-portfolio-tracker
title: Ethereum Portfolio Tracker
description: Add Ethereum wallets by their addresses and track your entire portfolio.
author: narghev

commands.name: add-ethereum-address
commands.title: Add Ethereum Address
commands.subtitle: Import an Eth address
commands.description: Import an Ethereum address to add to your portfolio.

commands.name: portfolio
commands.title: Portfolio
commands.subtitle: View your Ethereum portfolio
commands.description: View the total value and breakdown of your Ethereum portfolio.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
